artist: André Albert Marie Dunoyer de Segonzac
image_copyright: © Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York / ADAGP, Paris
inscription: title at bottom, center on mat
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn. (until d. 2012); by descent to his daughter Catherine Andrus, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
text: These men are passive observers of visceral sport, a boxing match. André Dunoyer de Segonzac is best known for his landscapes, but he also had a serious interest in boxing, a recurring subject in his art in the 1910s and ‘20s.
title: Spectators at a Boxing Match
